item.title: Cancel Culture Comes for Artists Who Posted About Charlie Kirk’s Death
item.description: A “South Park” episode was taken off air, a DC comic series was canceled, and several artists were fired in the aftermath of the shooting.

item.title: Ram ends EV pickup truck plans
item.description: Stellantis, the parent company of Ram, said Friday that it will no longer develop a battery-electric full-size pickup. The company cited low demand fo...

item.title: Bullets Found After the Charlie Kirk Shooting Carried Messages. Here’s What They Mean
item.description: The inscriptions on bullets recovered near the scene of Charlie Kirk's murder appear to reference video games like Helldivers 2 and online furry role-...

item.title: Via shrugs off tepid open to end first day of trading slightly above IPO price
item.description: Transit tech software startup Via had its IPO debut on Friday, starting at below offering price before rising to close at nearly $50.

item.title: Pilot union urges FAA to reject Rainmaker’s drone cloud-seeding plan
item.description: Rainmaker wants to use flares to seed clouds — the airline pilots' union says it won't be safe.
